content: © Christophe Sonderegger Private dining Khadija & André Remy Charmey On reservation. Khadija offers you Moroccan specialties and specialties of the area La Gruyère, your choice. Warm welcome. Ch. des Serres 3 1637 Charmey tel. +41 (0)26 927 15 23 La cuisine de Stéphane Montagny-les-Monts Stéphane and Marie-Laure have the pleasure to welcome you and to propose you an original, creative and delicious cooking since 2009. Route du Curtil 8 1774 Montagny-les-Monts tel. +41 26 660 59 47 Famille Terrapon Rueyres-Treyfayes Max. 20 pers. Season cook and vegetarian. Non-smoking Route de Treyfayes 9 1626 Rueyres-Treyfayes tel. +41 26 917 80 00 Chez Annelyse Orsonnens Speciality : poultry, game menu Ch. de l'Eglise 28 1694 Orsonnens tel. +41 26 653 12 32 "Table d'hôte" at the "Ferme du Hibou" Mur In a beautiful farm surrounded by the vineyards, with a view on Lake Murten and the Alps. Private dining from Mid-May to the End of August, only on Sundays from 10 am to 5 pm! N. & W. Gaillet Rue du Château 24 1787 Mur tel. +41 (0)26 673 18 85 "Table d'hôtes" Villars-les-Moines Castle Münchenwiler Villars-les-Moines Castle offers you a new regulars' table at the heart of an historical hall. Let's live an experience dived in a historical atmosphere, as if you were in the Ancient Régime. 1797 Münchenwiler tel. +41 26 672 81 81 Fouzia and Pierre-Yves Ducry Dompierre Swiss and moroccan meal under a real moroccan tent. THU - SUN, reservation necessary Le Bastillon 1 1583 Dompierre tel. +41 26 675 45 10 NaNea Traiteur - The journey of flavours Attalens Nutri-vitality Meal workshop Herbarium gourmet Valérie Veron Planche à Troupet 10 1616 Attalens tel. +41 (0)79 256 42 42 Chez Anita et Rémy Vauthey Remaufens Family or company dinner from 6 people Meals are served in a set aside "carnotzet" Opening: Friday evening, Saturday at noon and evening, Sunday at noon. On reservation. Chemin du Mont 30 1617 Remaufens tel. +41 (0)21 948 90 21 Chez Guy-Guy Sassel The proprietors of this establishment offer their diners gourmet pleasures from Mauritius – its flavours, culture and zest for life. Quartier de Morat 10 1534 Sassel tel. +41 26 668 14 68 Fouzia & Pierre-Yves Ducry Dompierre Swiss and moroccan meal under a real moroccan tent. Le Bastillon 1 1563 Dompierre tel. +41 (0)26 675 45 10 Paul & Marie-Laure Koestinger Mannens The owners of the place offer a simple and friendly Guest Table. Route du Jordil 6 1775 Mannens tel. +41 26 660 70 22 La Ferme du Biolley Vuisternens-en-Ogoz Traditional cuisine, Fribourg dishes, local products, Fribourg specialties, brunch, lunch. Open all year round, reservation requested La Ferme du Biolley Route du Biolley 40 1696 Vuisternens-en-Ogoz tel. +41 26 411 27 63 tel. +41 79 408 90 61 Serge Currat Riaz Private dinner and Bed & Breakfast, Indian food. Simple meal: CHF 20.-; Full meal: CHF 35.- CHF 50.- per single room. CHF 70.- per double room. CHF 10.- Breakfast. ROOMS: 1. BEDS: 2. Route de la Sionge 72 1632 Riaz tel. +41 (0)26 913 75 20 La Ferme des Planchettes Onnens Menus with local products and specialities directly from the farm. Specialities: beef ribs on a wood fire Farm with animals Opened all year long, on request La Ferme des Planchettes Marie-Jeanne Brönimann En Salley 60 Rte de Corjolens 1756 Onnens tel. +41 26 470 12 31 Alex'tra Ependes 4 double rooms in a family house with garden and a 360° view on the Jura and the mountains. 3 rooms with shared bathroom and 1 with a private bathroom. Toté J'ouré 1 1731 Ependes tel. +41 79 262 52 26 AEBERHARD Elsbeth and Beat Barbêreche Rooms with shared bathroom in a working farm, located in a small, quiet village. Guests have access to the garden. Various services and activities offered: farm visits, afternoon tea, meals, brunch, t... Petit-Vivy 11 1783 Barbêreche tel. +41 26 684 19 62 Chez Zineb Vuadens Moroccan cuisine in warm atmosphere. Zineb Lassaoui Le Dally 22 1628 Vuadens tel. +41 (0)79 926 03 94 Au 1er Bulle Come and eat something different at noon in Bulle. From Monday to Friday, there are 2 menus from CHF 19.-. In the evening and on week-ends, menus for groups (10 to 20 people) Grand-Rue 3 1630 Bulle tel. +41 (0)79 255 08 45 La Croix du Sud Morlon Moroccan cuisine Latifa Macherel La Croix 17 1638 Morlon tel. +41 (0)26 565 23 10 La Grange aux Thürler Villars-sous-Mont On reservation. Seasonal cooking. 20 people maximum. Route de l'Intyamon 135 1666 Villars-sous-Mont tel. +41 (0)79 789 19 47 "Charlotte et Saveurs" Vaulruz On reservation. Sophisticated cuisine with good quality products. Large selection of wines. One Friday per month. Charlotte Seydoux Rue des Molettes 36 1627 Vaulruz tel. +41 (0)79 721 86 92 Christian & Claudine Demierre "Révélation" Vaulruz On reservation. Molecular cuisine. With drinks included. Rustic and modern atmosphere. Rue du Château 26 1627 Vaulruz tel. +41 (0)26 912 87 62 Michel Terrapon Rueyres-Treyfayes On reservation. Seasonal cooking with 6 courses, vegetarian too, no smoking. Package with drinks. In a old farmhouse.
